label: personnelInfo
comment: Personnel information of an individual or business corresponding to this observation.

label: ghgScope
comment: Scope of the emission being reported as per GHG Protocol - Scope 1, Scope 2, Scope 3 as per the India GHG Program https://www.indiaghgp.org/explaining-scope-1-2-3

label: ghgName
comment: The name(s) of greenhouse gas(es) emitted during the reporting period. The presence of multiple gases is represented by enclosing them in a list.

label: ghgEmission
comment: The amount of greenhouse gas(es) emitted during the reporting period. In case of multiple gases, it is an array of gas emission measures in the order of gases mentioned in 'ghgName'.

label: totalEmission
comment: Total emission of greenhouse gases during the reporting period

label: reportPeriod
comment: The time period for which the report or analysis or document corresponding to this observation relates to.

label: startDate
comment: The date from which the data in the report corresponding to this observation relates to.

label: endDate
comment: The date until which the data in the report corresponding to this observation related to.

label: approvalDate
comment: The date on which a report or document has been offically approved.

label: certificateInfo
comment: Date of issual, expiry/validity, renewal of the document/certificate corresponding to this observation.

label: offsetValue
comment: The offset value represents a measurable decrease or elimination of greenhouse gas emissions, specifically carbon dioxide (CO2) or its equivalents, permitted or asserted during the reporting period corresponding to this observation.

label: creditValue
comment: Amount of carbon credits or its equivalents for the reporting period associated with an organisation corresponding to this observation.

label: targetValue
comment: Target cap of GHG emissions set by the management for the reporting period corresponding to this observation.

label: refPeriod
comment: A specific timeframe or time interval that is chosen as a basis for comparison, analysis, or measurement of certain events, data, or phenomena.

label: reportingAuthority
comment: The name of the entity authorised to approve the report or document corresponding to this observation.
